conversations.content: What's a good summary of my 100 most recent transactions this year in terms of categories and amounts?

<function_thought>
To summarize the 100 most recent transactions in terms of categories and amounts, I will first retrieve the transaction data using the function `get_most_recent_transactions`. This will allow me to review the transactions. Once I have the transaction data, I can analyze it to categorize and sum the amounts accordingly. 
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_most_recent_transactions({"n": 100})]</function_call>

<function_thought>
I have retrieved the list of recent transactions; however, it seems that the transactions are from 2022, which is not the current year. I need to confirm which year it is to provide the correct summary for this year's transactions. I'll check the current date to identify the year.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_most_recent_transactions({"n": 1})]</function_call>
